name: MOVING LED MATRIX PIC16F88 USB
short_description:
SCROLLING DISPLAY
INSTRUCTION OF OPERATION.
 The scrolling display will, display a scrolling  message that appears to be moving from LEFT to RIGHT.
It has the capability of varying scroll speed from first to slow. It has a memory capacity of 250MB, These means  you can write about 300 upper case and lowercase characters including spacing. It has editing capabilities,so it is possible to edit a single word without deleting the entire message. Can display both upper/lowercase characters.
MODE OFF OPERATION.
1. To enter programming mode, plug the PC keyboard to the display keyboard jack,press the ESCAPE key once,scrolling will stop, all messages will disappear and flashing CURSOR will then display as a dash  (........). You can now type the message that you want,press cap lock for upper and lowercase characters. use space bar for spacing . ENTER key when you finish.
2.Now the display is on program-me mode and you can now write anew message or edit some words.
